lessons.japanese: 街はクリスマスムード一色・・・もうじきイブだ。
lessons.english: The streets are in full Christmas mood - it's almost Christmas Eve.

lessons.japanese: 前半彼らは押せ押せムードとなった。
lessons.english: They went on the offensive in the first half.

lessons.japanese: 街はクリスマスムード一色・・・もうじきイブだ。
lessons.english: The streets are in full Christmas mood - it's almost Christmas Eve.

lessons.japanese: トムはムードメーカーだった。
lessons.english: Tom was the life of the party.
